root_layout.description: The only modern subscription management tool you need.

landing_page.title: Home Page - {brandName}
landing_page.description: A subscription management app that helps you track your expenses, avoid unnecessary fees, and have complete control over your monthly budget.

dashboard_page.title: Dashboard
dashboard_page.description: A centralized dashboard for viewing your subscriptions, monthly and annual expenses, as well as summary data for better financial control.

efficiency.label: Efficiency Score
efficiency.subtext: Top 15% of users in your region

problem.title: The Problem
problem.quote: “We are living in an era of ‘Subscription Creep’. We trade long-term financial freedom for short-term digital convenience, 10 € at a time.”

cta.title: Take back the keys.
cta.subtitle: Recurio is free for up to 5 subscriptions. No credit card required.

hero_component.description: Recurio shows you what recurring costs actually do over time. No aggressive budgeting— just clear numbers that reveal how small monthly decisions quietly compound.
hero_component.tip: Tip: Click a subscription to see how it impacts your monthly / yearly burn.

features_component.intro: Recurio is built around a simple idea: you can’t make good financial decisions if you never see the full picture.

cost_normalization.title: Cost Normalization
cost_normalization.description: We struggle to compare a 12 €/mo app with a 120 €/year service. Recurio translates every subscription into a single, normalized "Burn Rate," exposing the true weight of your digital footprint.

time_awareness.title: Time Awareness
time_awareness.description: Renewals don’t surprise you — because you see them coming. Track upcoming charges across 7 and 14-day windows and stay ahead of every renewal.

manual_entry.title: Manual Entry
manual_entry.description: Intentionality starts with data entry. By manually adding subs, you confront the cost before the charge happens.

privacy.title: Privacy by Architecture.
privacy.description: Your financial footprint is processed and stored exclusively within your browser's secure environment—never on our servers. We don't just protect your data; we ensure we never have custody of it in the first place.

data_visualization_component.heading: The cost of "Just one more."

description.part_1: A 15 €/month subscription isn’t just 15 €. It’s 1,800 € over ten years. When you see the numbers stretched across time, "small" choices reveal their true

data_visualization_component.disclaimer: Calculated based on a single 14.99 €/mo service. This does not account for annual price increases, which Recurio also tracks.

testimonials_component.heading: Feel the Love From Our Users
testimonials_component.description: Don’t just take our word for it—our users rave about how Recurio has transformed their financial habits. From saving more effectively to tracking expenses effortlessly, here are a few of our top reviews from real people across the globe.

people.alex: Absolutely transformed how I manage my finances. Finally, an app that just works.
people.samira: The UI is so intuitive! I was tracking expenses in minutes.
people.jordan: Recurio helped me save for a vacation faster than I ever thought possible.
people.nina: Love the analytics! I can see exactly where my money goes every month.
people.marcus: Finally, a budgeting app that makes sense and doesn’t overcomplicate things.
people.leah: My partner and I can now sync our spending. Game changer.
people.ethan: I was skeptical at first, but Recurio keeps me accountable daily.
people.clara: Excellent for freelancers. I can track multiple projects effortlessly.
people.omar: Simple, clean, and fast. Exactly what I needed to stay on top of expenses.
people.sophia: Helps me visualize my yearly budget in a way spreadsheets never could.
people.ryan: Finally stopped overspending thanks to the insights Recurio provides.
people.isabella: The notifications and reminders are subtle but extremely helpful.
people.dylan: I’ve tried other apps, but this one actually keeps me engaged and informed.
people.emily: Tracking my savings goals has never been this satisfying.
people.leo: Incredible local-first approach, works perfectly without delays.
people.hannah: I recommend Recurio to anyone serious about controlling their finances.
people.noah: The app is lightweight, fast, and the design is aesthetically pleasing.
people.maya: I actually enjoy opening it daily to see my spending trends.

delete_dialog.title: Are you absolutely sure?
delete_dialog.warning: Once deleted, the subscription and all related data will be <important>removed</important>.
delete_dialog.impact_text: Deletion will affect aggregated subscription statistics such as totals, averages, historical insights etc. <italic>These numbers will be recalculated and may no longer reflect past reality.</italic>
delete_dialog.recommendation_text: Deletion should only be performed for <critical>extremely critical reasons</critical>. In most cases, changing the status to <paused>"Paused"</paused> or <cancelled>"Cancelled"</cancelled> is safer.
